https://tmrev.io/movie/276355-Dangerous Edge: A Life of Graham Greene 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zdP5ouhAi4jmq7vnztnlOPjf3AA.jpg The documentary uses Graham Greene's own words from his books and recordings, as well as photographs and clips from his many films, to reveal the fascinating life of one of the great writers of the twentieth century. Dangerous Edge: A Life of Graham Greene
